page.name: NoteWorthy
page.description: NoteWorthy is an auditioned pop a cappella ensemble that meets FIRST SEMESTER ONLY after school on WEDNESDAYS from 2:35-3:45 in the MMS Choir Room 609.  Auditions are scheduled in late August and are open to any MMS student.  There is a $40 club fee for NoteWorthy (no student will be refused due to financial hardship).  NoteWorthy performs in the A Cappella Clinic (Oct.) and the 7th and 8th grade choral concerts (Nov/Dec). Visit the Schoology Group page for NoteWorthy for specific information on auditions and events.
